meanings.definition: A unit of electric current equal to one-tenth of an ampere.
meanings.sent1: The device measured the abamps flowing through the circuit.
meanings.sent2: The technician checked the abamps to ensure proper electrical flow.
meanings.sent3: The abamps in the wire were so tiny, they whispered to each other.
meanings.sent4: The abamps danced along the wires like fireflies in the night.
meanings.sent5: I could see the abamps shimmering through the cables, like tiny stars.
